manifest.name: domhandler
manifest.description: Handler for htmlparser2 that turns pages into a dom

scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run lint
scripts.lint: npm run lint:es && npm run lint:prettier
scripts.format: npm run format:es && npm run format:prettier
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:esm: tsc --module esnext --target es2019 --outDir lib/esm && echo '{"type":"module"}' > lib/esm/package.json
